Aviation Security is a sensitive issue which requires specialised professional skills. As per
BCAS guidelines, the screening duties should be entrusted to those personnel who have been
Certified as Screeners after qualifying Basic AVSEC Course.

Some personnel are failing repeatedly and may be on purpose.
